gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-normalAttack
gadget.mouseovertext: Hack Attack -- Damage done by most hand-to-hand weapons, such as swords and axes. Pierce Attack -- Damage done by most ranged weapons, such as bows and slings. Crush Attack -- Damage done by siege weapons, and some myth units.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-pierceAttack
gadget.mouseovertext: Hack Attack -- Damage done by most hand-to-hand weapons, such as swords and axes. Pierce Attack -- Damage done by most ranged weapons, such as bows and slings. Crush Attack -- Damage done by siege weapons, and some myth units.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-crushAttack

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-normalArmor
gadget.mouseovertext: Hack Armor -- The percentage of damage absorbed from hack attacks, such as swords. Pierce Armor -- The percentage of damage absorbed from pierce attacks, such as arrows. Crush Armor -- The percentage of damage absorbed from crush attacks, such as siege weapons, and some myth units.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-pierceArmor
gadget.mouseovertext: Train Time -- Current Unit Train Time. Speed -- Current Unit Speed. Bounty -- Current Unit/Building Favor Bounty if destroyed by Norse. LOS -- Current Unit/Building Line Of sight.
